formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: The current statistical testing framework takes too much time to run and use, though it doesn't take that much time to generate the tests. We should automate the effort to run the statistical tests in such a way that they get good results and can get proper testing feedback.

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: Gianfranco's APLUnit system should work for doing these automated tests. We should split out each statistical test case into its own file and do all the appropriate testing that we need to do from in there. This should also include a conversion of all the previous testing efforts into this framework to double check and to unify the framework.
